body:
ngspice, currently a dependency to package kicad, was only made as a library.
Added the option to make a bin with the variant build=bin, letting build=lib being the default.
Added options cider and xspice. Now fft is an option, we may use fftw or any compatible api (such as MKL).
Added option X for the binary, as well as readline.
Added adms feature when compiling against the git master.
Checked compilation against nvhpc-21.3, Intel 2021, and gcc. Conflicts are set for old gcc with recent ngspice.
Compilation line is made visible for easier error checks in compilation. OpenMP option is made available.
Added @aweits as a maintainer since kicad needs it.
title: ngspice: enhanced to produce bin and more options.
